data.why:
Writing an interface module to our credit card processing gateway -
    we support Vital, Nova, Concord, Heartland, 53rd, Global, FDMS, and
    Paymentech for all industries (Retail, MOTO, Ecommerce, Restaurant,
    Hotel, and Autorental.)

    Our gateway supports credit card, PIN based debit, and check for
    all these platforms.

    We support the raw track data as well, allowing you to process card
    present transactions as well as card not present - code PC
    applications to take cardswipe transactions and PIN based debit over
    the internet!
